name: CoSy Contact Sync for WhatsApp (ROOT)
description: CoSy - Contact Sync for WhatsApp syncs your WhatsApp friends images with your local phone contact images.  IMPORTANT: this app only works with a ROOTED device! Dont download and try it if you dont know what ROOT is or if your device is not ROOTED! Sorry, I cant offer a version for not rooted devices because this is not possible technically. Thanks for your understanding.  This all works in 3 simple steps:  Save your friends profile images in your gallery (manual part of the process) Link your contacts with your WhatsApp friends (Tell the app which WhatsApp friend is which phone contact) Sync your images  Functions  This app allows you to sync WhatsApp profile images with your phone contacts You can link contacts based on the name similarity for a very fast app setup Sync images automatically (once every day or whatever frequency you want) or manually on demand only Sync images if youre phone is loading or if its connected to WLAN only, if desired Optionally tint images before setting them as contact images Optional image history - save history images and even go back to previous contact images if you dont like a friends new WhatsApp profile image  Disclaimer CoSy in no way claims to be affiliated to, associated with, or sponsored by WhatsApp. All of WhatsApps images, icons, copyrights, and assets are property of WhatsApp
